name: thangmo
description: A small app to send hot stories from HackerNews or links from RSS channels to Telegram channels

BITLY_API_TOKEN.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies

BITLY_ENABLED.description: Whether or not use Bitly to shorten links

HACKERNEWS_ENABLED.description: Whether or not enable HackerNews posts

HACKERNEWS_YCOMBINATOR_LINK.description: Whether or not include a link to HackerNews

TELEGRAM_CHANNEL.description: Default Telegram channel to send messages to
